mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book(isbn, title, image, author, translator, publisher, pubdate, summary, price) VALUES(#{isbn,javaType=string}, #{title,javaType=string}, #{image,javaType=string}, #{author,javaType=string}, #{translator,javaType=string}, #{publisher,javaType=string}, #{pubdate,javaType=string}, #{summary,javaType=string}, #{price,javaType=string});
